title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 96.2 - Fishing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 96.2 - Fishing

State Regulations

No person shall fish in the area other than outside areas
posted with "Restricted Area" signs. Fishing shall be subject to the following
regulations: (a) No person shall fish
from December 1 through April 30. (b) No person shall fish from sunset to
sunrise. (c) No person shall fish
from or use a boat, canoe or any type of flotation device. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
96.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
